item.title: Service
item.description: Editorial Board ACI Avances en Ciencias e Ingenierías, since 2021 International Journal of Image Processing and Vision Science , since 2021 Board of Distinguished Reviewer ACM Transactions on Autonomous and Adaptive Systems (ACM TAAS), since 2021 Organisator and Track Chair Technology and Environment Workshop at Extraction et Gestion des Connaissance (EGC 2021) conference, Montpellier, France. January 2021. Track Chair Software Systems and Services at the 9th IEEE International Conference on Future Internet of Things and Cloud (FiCloud 2022), Rome, Italy.

item.title: Team
item.description: Along with the permanent members of MiMove@Inria and Lisite@Isep, and all my scientific collaborators, I work or have worked with: PhD students Hussein Baalbaki, Isep Paris and Lebanese University. December 2020 - Shufan Jiang, Isep Paris and University of Reims. #DigitAg partner October 2019 - William Aboucaya, Inria Paris. October 2019 - Postdoctoral Researchers Ehsan Ahvar, Inria Paris. Postdoc. July 2017 - June 2018. Shohreh Ahvar, Inria Paris.

item.title: Events & Talks
item.description: Organization. Le numérique au service de la démocracie. Chaire Isep - Institut Catholique de Paris “Citoyenneté et Numérique”. 25 March 2020. Civic Tech@AI Isep conference series (Slides in French). 13 June 2019. Coach & Organization. #FrHack! Le Hackathon des fréquences. In collaboration with Agence Nationale des Fréquences (ANFR). 25-26 May 2019. Coach & Jury. AI Hackathon - Marketing and Environment challenges. 29-31 Mars 2019. Coach & Jury & Local organization.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Before joining Isep, I taught several Computer Science courses at undergraduate and graduate levels since 2004 at Simon Bolivar University, Andres Bello Catholic University, Paris-Dauphine University - PSL and Nanterre University, and participated in a MOOC about citizen participation and Civic Tech. I also teach a joint course with the Catholic University of Paris, a Big Data course at CNAM and participated in the French national programme to train high-school teachers to teach Computer Science and Information Technologies.
